messages.content: Explain the purpose of the Fit Size node in Comfy UI.
The Fit Size node automatically adjusts the size of an image to fit within a specified bounding box, making it ideal for copying screengrab content into Comfy UI without worrying about aspect ratios.
How does the Fit Size From Int node work?
The node scales an image to fit within a given width, height, and maximum size, using basic math to ensure that the output image size is appropriate for Stable Diffusion.
What does the Fit Size From Image node do differently from the Fit Size From Int node?
The node automatically extracts the width and height of the image and can upscale or downscale the size to fit within a specified maximum size.
Explain the functionality of the Fit Image And Resize node.
The node resizes an image to fit within a bounding box and outputs both the resulting image and a latent batch, making it suitable for img2img workflows.
How does the Load Image And Resize To Fit node simplify image handling in workflows?
The node combines image handling capabilities into one node, allowing users to easily copy and paste image data without saving images.
List the input and output values available in the Values section.
The Values section provides inputs for vae, image, max_size, resampling, upscale, batch_size, and add_noise, and outputs latent, image, width, height, aspect ratio, and mask.
